title: التحية عبر الهاتف - العربية الفصحى
description: تحية ومحادثة عبر الهاتف باللغة العربية الفصحى

dialogue.translation: Hello, how are you?

dialogue.text: ألو أهلا بخير اتصلت بك البارحة ولم ترد
dialogue.translation: Hello, welcome, I'm fine. I called you yesterday and you didn't answer

dialogue.text: نعم نمت باكرا هل من جديد؟
dialogue.translation: Yes, I slept early. Is there anything new?
Certainly there is: when shall we meet so I can tell you?
Does Sunday suit you?
Yes, I'll wait for you at my house

title: التحية عبر الهاتف - الأمازيغية
description: تحية ومحادثة عبر الهاتف باللغة الأمازيغية

dialogue.translation: Hello, how are you?

dialogue.text: Allo , Azul Ssawleɣ-de idelli ur d-terriḍ ara
dialogue.translation: Hello, I called you yesterday but you didn't answer
Yes, I went to sleep early

dialogue.text: S tidet yella mi ara nemlil akkenad ak-d-nini
dialogue.translation: Truly there is, when shall we meet so I can tell you?
Does Sunday suit you?
Yes, I'll wait for you at my house

title: التحية عبر الهاتف - الشمال الجزائري
description: تحية ومحادثة عبر الهاتف باللهجة الشمالية الجزائرية

dialogue.text: ألو سلام هذي غيبة واش حوالك؟
dialogue.translation: Hello, peace, this is an absence, how are you?

dialogue.text: ألو لاباس زڨيتلك البارح بصح مرديتليش
dialogue.translation: Hello, I'm fine. I called you yesterday but you didn't answer me
Yes, I slept early. Anything new?
There is, let's meet and I'll tell you again
Right, does Sunday help you?
Yes, I'll wait for you inside the house

title: التحية عبر الهاتف - الغرب الجزائري
description: تحية ومحادثة عبر الهاتف باللهجة الغربية الجزائرية

dialogue.translation: Hello, peace, this is an absence, how are you doing?
Hello, I'm fine. I called you but you didn't answer
Yes, I slept early. Anything new?
Just that, let's meet and I'll tell you
Right, what do you think about Sunday?
Okay, I'll wait for you at home

title: التحية عبر الهاتف - الشرق الجزائري
description: تحية ومحادثة عبر الهاتف باللهجة الشرقية الجزائرية

dialogue.translation: Hello, peace

dialogue.text: أهلاا لباس راني عيطتلك البارح ومريبوونديتلييش
dialogue.translation: Hello, I'm fine. I called you yesterday and you didn't answer me
Yes, I slept early. Is there anything new?
Yes, there is, let's meet
Does Sunday suit you?
Come, I'll wait for you at my house

title: التحية عبر الهاتف - الجنوب الجزائري
description: تحية ومحادثة عبر الهاتف باللهجة الجنوبية الجزائرية

dialogue.translation: Hello, how are you?

dialogue.text: آلو أهلا لباس راني عيطتلك البارح ومرديتليش
dialogue.translation: Hello, welcome, I'm fine. I called you yesterday and you didn't answer me
Yes, I slept early. Anything new?
Obviously there is, let's meet and I'll tell you
Does Sunday help you?
Yes, I'll wait for you at home
